TopicTitle: Large rocket not launching with high thrust to weight ratio

Articles.Content: I have a large rocket with a thrust to weight ratio of 2.8 that is using 6 mammoth II's(it started with 5) and yet cant even raise off the launch pad, meaning I cant launch large things into orbit because my larger rockets cant get off the ground. Ive done launches with rockets this size before with less power and they managed to get off the pad just fine but its stopped working
